products.name: Cornetto
products.description: Cornetto is a branded frozen dessert cone manufactured by Unilever. Several variations of the product exist, ranging from milk based ice cream to vegetable fat based dessert.

products.name: Magnum
products.description: Vanilla bean ice cream dipped in white chocolate.

products.name: Calippo
products.description: Calippo is an freezie brand owned by Unilever, and sold as part of the Heartbrand line of products in most countries, including the Wall's brand in the United Kingdom.

products.name: Fab
products.description: The brand Fab is an ice lolly on a stick in the United Kingdom, introduced by J. Lyons & Co. Ltd. who launched the product in 1967.

products.name: Tip Top
products.description: Fonterra Brands (Tip Top) Ltd or commonly known simply as Tip Top ice cream, is a subsidiary of the Fonterra Co-operative Group based in Auckland, New Zealand.
